entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:35 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -37.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 12:12 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -37.4°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -42.1°C
Wind: WSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 37. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
